login.title: Hello! Welcome.
login.control.code: Check to see that the control code matches the sms you received:
login.error.invalid.user.credentials: Sadly you are not a member of Tuleva yet.
login.error.generic: There appears to have been a mistake. Please try again.
login.permission.note: To best help you, we will request information about your pension account from the Estonian Central Securities Depository. By logging in you are giving Tuleva permission to do this.
login.not.member: You aren't a member of Tuleva yet?
steps.intro: By becoming a member of Tuleva you have made it possible to create our very own pension funds! Now is the time to transfer your funds.
steps.intro.new.member: Congratulations on joining Tuleva! Now you can also transfer your pension to Tuleva.
steps.transfer-future-capital: Direct future fund contributions to Tuleva
select.sources.select.all.subtitle: This is the easiest option, you will be making payments into your very own pension fund and saving money on fees. For you, switching funds is free.
select.sources.select.some: Exchange only some current fund units.
select.sources.select.some.subtitle: If you wish to make specific changes, make them here:
select.sources.select.some.cost: For you, switching funds is free.
select.sources.select.none.subtitle: Your current fund units will remain in your current pension fund. If you wish to save money and exchange current fund units you may do so at a later date. The next step allows you to transfer future fund contributions.
select.sources.select.all.recommended: We recommend this fund based on your current age
target.funds.EE3600109435.title: Tuleva World Stocks Pension Fund
target.funds.EE3600109435.description: Agressive fund - this fund is best for you if you wish to maximise returns and you are not scared by short term market fluctuations.
target.funds.EE3600109443.title: Tuleva World Bonds Pension Fund
target.funds.EE3600109443.description: Conservative fund - this fund is best for you if you only have a few years left until retirement or you are willing to accept lower returns in the name of less risk.
target.funds.EE3600109435.tooltip.title: Tuleva World Stocks Pension Fund
target.funds.EE3600109435.tooltip.invest: BlackRock Developed World ex-Tobacco Index Sub-Fund — 22%

BGIF Global Government Bond Index Fund — 27%

target.funds.EE3600109443.tooltip.invest: BlackRock Euro Govt Bond Index Fund — 25%
BGIF Euro Aggregate Bond Index Fund — 25%
BGIF Global Government Bond Index Fund — 25%
transfer.future.capital.intro: With Tuleva funds you can be confident that the fees you pay are the size you and other Tuleva members decide on.
transfer.future.capital.intro.choose: Pick a fund for your future contributions:
transfer.future.capital.no.subtitle: Your pension fund contributions will continue to be directed into  {{currentFundName}} pension fund, with a management fee of {{currentFundManagementFee}}% per year. If you wish to save money on fees, you can direct your contributions to Tuleva at a later date.
transfer.future.capital.no.already.conve: Your pension fund contributions will continue to be directed into  {{currentFundName}} pension fund, with a management fee of {{currentFundManagementFee}}% per year.
confirm.mandate.future.contribution: I wish to transfer future fund payments to
confirm.mandate.switch.sources: wish to exchange current fund units for:
confirm.mandate.agree.to.terms: I confirm that I have had the chance to view all fund prospectuses. By clicking “sign“ a digitally signed application will be sent to the register.
confirm.mandate.view.info: web page you can compare the fees and prospectuses of all registered pension funds. Clicking the preview button you can download the application and if you so desire, send it directly to the registry. By clicking sign and send, Tuleva web application will forward the signed application on your behalf to the registry.
confirm.mandate.not.filled.understand: Did we understand you correctly? You do not wish to exchange current pension fund units nor direct future pension fund contributions to Tuleva.
confirm.mandate.not.filled.cheapest: Tuleva has the lowest management fees out of all Estonian pension funds.
confirm.mandate.not.filled.look.again: I'd like to look over my options once more
confirm.mandate.not.filled.thinking: I'm still considering my options. I don't need help at the moment!
footer.name: Commercial Association Tuleva
success.your.payments: Your future contributions will be directed to Tuleva pension fund
success.shares.switched: In case you wished to transfer your current fund units, those will be exchanged for Tuleva pension fund units
success.view.profile.title: Check your member profile and account
terms.of.use.title: Agreement
terms.of.use.subheading: By logging into the Tuleva web application you are giving Commercial Association Tuleva permission request information about your pension account from the Estonian Central Securities Depository. Among this information is your:
terms.of.use.list.item.4: pension fund, into which you are currently making contributions
terms.of.use.main.line.1: Based on this data Tuleva will display your pension account statement information, help you make the fund unit exchange application and/or the fund choice application and send the applications either through an account administration or directly to the Estonian Central Securities Depository.
terms.of.use.main.line.2: Commercial Association Tuleva does not save the information received from ECSD, but only registers your log in info (first and last name, personal ID code, login time).
terms.of.use.main.line.3: The person responsible for handling the data for Commercial Association Tuleva is Tõnu Pekk, e-mail: tuleva@tuleva.ee.
terms.of.use.main.line.4: The assumptions behind the Tuleva calculator are defined here.

newUserFlow.newUser.i.want.just.to.trans: I just want to transfer my pension
new.user.flow.intro: See for yourself, why Tuleva is a good choice and become a member.
new.user.flow.why: Tuleva funds have very low management fees. As a member you'd get additional savings due to earning a pension bonus.
new.user.flow.comparison: Compare, how much money you'd save by using a Tuleva pension fund.
new.user.flow.non.member.title: Good choice! Everyone can transfer their pension to Tuleva.
new.user.flow.non.member.intro: If you wish, you can become a member at a later date. You can transfer your second pillar using the most comfortable channel for you
new.user.flow.signup.title: Great choice! By becoming a member you are also becoming an owner of Tuleva.
new.user.flow.signup.tos.end: I assure that I do not have an active criminal punishment
new.user.flow.payment.title: Membership fee
new.user.flow.payment.intro: To finish the process please pay the membership fee. Then you can transfer your pension to Tuleva.
invalid.mandate.source.amount.exceeded: Transfer amount for one of the funds is more than 100%.
invalid.mandate.same.source.and.target.t: Same source and target fund transfers are not allowed.
mobile.id.session.not.found: Mobile id session is expired. Please log in again.
mobile.id.signature.session.not.found: Mobile id session is expired. Please log in again.
id.card.signature.session.not.found: Id card session is expired. Please log in again.
comparison.intro: A deceptively small difference in management fees will end up taking up a very big part of your future pension. In Tuleva funds you will pay less fees than in any other pension fund.
comparison.call.to.action: Calculate, how much you can save thanks to Tuleva!
comparison.expected.index.return.tooltip: The default return value offered, is based on the historical returns of one of the largest index funds in the world (BlackRock World Equity Index Fund). As a Tuleva member you of course known that past returns are not a guarantee for the future. You can also test to see what would happen with higher or lower returns.
Our calculator was built by Tuleva members to help you see why fees matter. They have done their best to be correct and use realistic assumptions. For simplicity, we assume no chances in fees though in reality Tuleva fees will definitely drop, hopefully others will reduce fees as well. Let us know if you see any errors, or have any suggestions for improvements!
select.sources.comparison.intro: With Tulevaga you will save thousands of euros on fees.
account.non.member.statement: You are not a member of Tuleva yet.
account.initial-capital.statement: Your contribution to the initial capital of Tuleva is {{initialCapital}}€.
account.converted.user.statement: You have successfully filled an application to transfer future payments and current fund units to Tuleva.
new.user.flow.non.member.bank1.content2: In the left hand menu pick “Pension” and find subsection “Fund switch”
new.user.flow.non.member.bank1.content4: Tuleva World Stocks Pension Fund can be found under the aggressive selection, Tuleva World Bonds Pension Fund can be found under the conservative selection
new.user.flow.non.member.bank1.content5: Pick your preferred fund and click “Continue” to move on
new.user.flow.non.member.bank1.content6: Check to see, if your future payments are assigned into the fund you chose
new.user.flow.non.member.bank1.content7: Check to see, if your current units are assigned to transfer into the fund you chose (*the exchange is carried out based on monetary value of units)
new.user.flow.non.member.bank1.content8: Use the checkbox to verify that you've had the chance to read the Terms and Conditions
new.user.flow.non.member.bank1.content9: Click the green “Accept” button and youäre done!
new.user.flow.non.member.bank2.content2: From the top menu pick Saving/Pension
new.user.flow.non.member.bank2.content3: Click on the selection “Pension second pillar”
new.user.flow.non.member.bank2.content4: Click the black button “Pension transfer application”
new.user.flow.non.member.bank2.content5: Tick the option “I wish to direct future payments into another fund”
new.user.flow.non.member.bank2.content6: Tick the option “I wish to exchange pension fund units”
new.user.flow.non.member.bank2.content7: Pick your preferred Tuleva fund for your future payments
new.user.flow.non.member.bank2.content8: Pick your preferred Tuleva tund to transfer current units (*if you wish to transfer all units, write “100” into the box, *the exchange is carried out based on monetary value of units)
new.user.flow.non.member.bank2.content9: Check to see that all selections are correct
new.user.flow.non.member.bank2.content10: Click on the black button “Accept” – you're done!
new.user.flow.non.member.bank3.content2: In the left hand menu click “Investing, saving, pension”
new.user.flow.non.member.bank3.content3: Click on the subsection PENSION and choose “Second pillar”
new.user.flow.non.member.bank3.content4: In the middle of the page click “Choose a pension fund”
new.user.flow.non.member.bank3.content5: Pick your preferred Tuleva fund for your future payments*
new.user.flow.non.member.bank3.content6: Pick your preferred Tuleva tund to transfer current units* (if you wish to transfer all units, write “100” into the box,*the exchange is carried out based on monetary value of units)
new.user.flow.non.member.bank3.content7: Make sure you've ticked the boxes in front of your selections.
new.user.flow.non.member.bank3.content9: Tick the box to accept the Terms and Conditions
new.user.flow.non.member.bank3.content10: Click on the orange button “Accept” – you're done!
new.user.flow.non.member.bank4.content2: In the left hand menu pick “My applications”
new.user.flow.non.member.bank4.content4: Choose, which Tuleva fund you wish to direct your payments into.
new.user.flow.non.member.bank4.content5: Check all necessary information, and pay for the application using a bank link (0,65 euros)
new.user.flow.non.member.bank4.content7: Pick which Tuleva fund you wish to transfer your units into (*the exchange is carried out based on monetary value of units)
new.user.flow.non.member.bank4.content8: Check all necessary information, and pay for the application using a bank link (1,5 euros)
new.user.flow.new.user.total.fund.value: Your current second pillar total savings are
new.user.flow.new.user.old.fund.fees: In your current fund you will pay a total of
new.user.flow.new.user.save.fees.tuleva: Saving in Tuleva, you will save
new.user.flow.new.user.money.to.self: save money for yourself, not the bank
new.user.flow.new.user.why.join.tuleva: Why should you also join Tuleva?
new.user.flow.new.user.tuleva.member.ext: In addition, as a member you will save
new.user.flow.new.user.tuleva.owner: get to be the owner of your own pension fund
new.user.flow.new.user.profit.sharing: be eligible for future profit sharing
new.user.flow.new.user.improve.the.pensi: improve the Estonian pension system together
new.user.flow.new.user.membership.fee: Pay a one time fee of 100€
new.user.flow.new.user.can.transfer.pens: You can easily transfer your pension after becoming a member
new.user.flow.footnote.calculator.part1: Ülal võrdluses peame panga pensionifondi all silmas fonde, mida valitsevad Swedbanki, SEB Panga, Nordea Panga või LHV Pangaga ühte konsolideerimisgruppi kuuluvad fondivalitsejad. Nendes pensionifondides on sinu raha fondivalitseja äririskide vastu täpselt
new.user.flow.footnote.calculator.part3: nagu Tuleva pensionifondides. Samas on nende pensionifondide keskmine valitsemistasu 1,08% (allikas:
new.user.flow.footnote.calculator.part5: ) ehk enam kui kolm korda kõrgem Tuleva pensionifondide valitsemistasust (0,34%).
new.user.flow.footnote.cheapest: Tuleva pensionifondide valitsemistasu on keskmiselt kolm korda madalam kui panga pensionifondide valitsemistasu (0,34% vs 1,08%). Tuleva pensionifondid on kõigi fondide lõikes soodsamad kui ühegi teise Eesti fondivalitseja juhitud fondid. Siiski on täna veel üle 60-aastastele inimestele mõeldud Swedbank K1 fondi valitsemistasu madalam - 0,29%. Kui sa oled vähemalt 60-aastane, on see fond sulle Tuleva Maailma Võlakirjade Fondi kõrval arvestatav valik.
